title: Photosynthesis Vocabulary Quiz Prep
objective: Students will memorize the steps of photosynthesis

activities.name: Vocabulary Drill
activities.description: Students copy definitions from the board
instructions: Copy each vocabulary word and its definition from the board into your notebook
You have 20 minutes to copy all 8 terms
Raise your hand if you need help spelling a word

activities.name: Memorization Practice
activities.description: Students quiz each other on definitions
instructions: Take turns quizzing each other on the 8 vocabulary words
Say the word, your partner says the definition
Switch roles after going through all words
Keep practicing until time is called
The goal is to memorize all definitions word-for-word

activities.name: Written Quiz Practice
activities.description: Practice quiz matching terms to definitions
instructions: Match each term to its correct definition
You may not use your notes
This is practice for Friday's real quiz

assessment.description: Write the definition of photosynthesis from memory
